helpPanelContents.networkAddress.para1: Enter network address information for the target host in this panel. First select the IP version â€“ either IPv4 or IPv6. Depending on the IP version, IP addresses have a different format:
helpPanelContents.networkAddress.para2:
- IPv4 addresses consist of 4 decimal numbers separated by dots, for example "192.168.0.1"
- IPv6 addresses consist of up to 8 hexadecimal numbers separated by colons, for example "fd00::1a"
helpPanelContents.networkAddress.para3: Next, enter the IP address information:
helpPanelContents.networkAddress.para4:
- Host IP address and prefix or netmask: the IP address assigned to the target host
- Gateway IP address: the address of an IP gateway that the host can use to reach other networks
- Nameserver IP address: the address of a DNS server to use for resolving host names into IP addresses
- Host name: an optional name to be associated with the host
